com.aionemu.commons.network
Class Acceptor

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.commons.network.Acceptor

public class Acceptor
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an Acceptor that will accept sockets
connections dispatched by Accept Dispatcher. Acceptor is attachment
of ServerSocketChannel SelectionKey registered on Accept Dispatcher Selector.
Acceptor will create new AConnection object using ConnectionFactory.create(SocketChannel socket)
representing accepted socket, register it into one of ReadWrite Dispatcher
Selector as ready for io read operations.

Author:
-Nemesiss-
See Also:
Dispatcher, ServerSocketChannel, SelectionKey, SocketChannel, Selector, AConnection, ConnectionFactory, NioServer

Method Detail

accept

public final void accept(java.nio.channels.SelectionKey key)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Method called by Accept Dispatcher Selector when socket
connects to ServerSocketChannel listening for connections.
New instance of AConnection will be created by ConnectionFactory,
socket representing accepted connection will be register into
one of ReadWrite Dispatchers Selector as ready for io read operations.

Parameters:
key - SelectionKey representing ServerSocketChannel that is accepting
new socket connection.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
Dispatcher, ServerSocketChannel, SelectionKey, SocketChannel, Selector, AConnection, ConnectionFactory
